dmca.title: Re: Your Reference Number 122754 BV4 for MBNA Acct. 4264293997749449
dmca.body:
Creditors Interchange:

I demand that you CEASE and DESIST in your efforts to collect on the above referenced account. (Your Reference Number 122754 BV4 for original creditor MBNA Acct. 4264293997749449 c/o eCast Settlement Corporation.) It is my personal policy not to deal with collection agencies and I will only deal with the original creditor of this account. 

I am making this demand within my rights under the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, 15 USCA 1692c(c).

You are hereby instructed to cease collection efforts immediately or face legal sanctions under applicable Federal and State law. 

GIVE THIS LETTER THE IMMEDIATE ATTENTION IT DESERVES. 

Yours truly,




Philip Taylor
